title: I am so tired of seeing lee sin in EVERY game i play
body:
Out of my recent 4 games in ranked, 3 had lee sin in them, the other lee was banned. I really wish lee sin would get "nidalee'd" just thrown out of meta for a while, BUT NO. He cant be because of riots precious little favoritism game. He has literally had the number 1 pick rate for junglers for pretty mcuh all of this season and a lot of season 6 and even before then. His kit, is toxic. There is nothing fun nor interactive about ward hopping behind someone under turret and ulting them out of turret. Like ??? Where is the counterplay to a point and click displacement that sends you flying into 1-3 people all at once. NEWSFLASH there is none. I literally dont understand why he even gets to be so safe.  Lb is too frequently abused? Gut her. Kat? Take out ward hops and force her to only be able to get shunpo resets late. Nidalee is really strong? Ruin her, make her not a great pick anymore. Lee is also god tier? Hmm, maybe nerf *some* of his damage but nothing that would substantially make him even slightly horrible. God forbid they even touch lee sin without giving him his 8th damn skin. Meanwhile cass hasent gotten a skin since s5 but whatever riot. Did i mention how long its been since urgot has seen a skin or even a balance tweak? But you know maybe we can compensate by throwing THAT under the rug and you know making lee sin freelo as hell :^). Never mind how absolutely brain dead he is. I mean at least nidalee had to land a spear to actually do anything. Lee can just walk up to you and hit r and the chances of him missing q are so damn slim unless someone walks in front of it or if the player actually goes, into a coma. He also gets a free shield! Oh you ignited him or an ally and theyre about to die from the last tick. How about no ? Because on top of damage he should get a shield so he doesnt ever have to die unless he is plastic 10

/endrant
Commence the downvotes and the "git gud" comments

replies.body: Lee is riots poster boy, having been in the meta pretty much since season 2 and I doubt they are changing that anytime soon

They shouldn't. He is a highlight reel champion for their competitive scene and he is very easy to balance and one of their best-designed champions. He is probably also their benchmark for junglers.
Not to mention their money maker for Skins
To be fair, Lee has lost large parts of the kit, over the years.

> [{quoted}](name=TheHappyReaperz,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KXiZpjlr,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-04-24T18:10:59.673+0000)
>
> To be fair, Lee has lost large parts of the kit, over the years.

What parts?  The last change I remember that wasn't a numbers love tap was giving him percent health damage on his ult when he started getting pushed out of favor during the jungle tank meta when Cinderhilt was added.

Safeguard lost energy return, if the shield was broken, Iron Will lost armor, as well as lost sustain stats and duration, Cripple lost its AS slow, and Tempest no longer reveals invisible targets, and only reveals targets damaged by it.
That's crazy. To think he's still got more of everything in his kit than most champions.
Every champion. He has three mechanics missing from his kit: invulnerability, invisibility, and max health % damage. If he had that he would have every mainstream mechanic in the game.

He has missing health % on his Q tho. And his R kinda has max health % too - and stronger than regular max health % if used properly since you are dealing tank's HP% to a squish instead of squishy's HP% to a squishy.
Yet he remains a top-tier jungler after all of the nerfs.

I remember back in season 3 I think they changed his W so it does not longer shield minions. 

I hate lee so much. Definitely one of the top 3 champion I hate.
Who are the other two?

Ahri, fizz and lee sin.

Riot knows Lee is broken. They openly admitted it a while ago on the forums, and also said they will never significantly nerf him because he makes money at LC$ -- of course, that post was deleted, and I'm sure that guy was fired.
No one ever said that. You're exaggerating way too much. You probably didn't actually read what he said

>For Lee Sin, he is just overpowered, so we're bumping him down slightly next patch - junglers are performing very well at the moment and he is the best jungler. (He adds a lot to competitive play though, so we don't want to hit him too hard).  - Fizz Enthusiast. 

He's paraphrasing, but....yeah...
Nice job taking it completely out of context

So from "no one ever said that" to "you took this out of context."  Hmm, how about you get off of Riot's dick and follow the link Lank put up so you can see the big picture here...or is all of this _fake news_ since it paints the benevolent leaders in a bad light?

The part of the comment you didnt post: 

> Lee is different in that he can be playable in competitive while being fair in normal. Whereas for Amumu and Sej, usually if they're playable in competitive they will probably be unfair in normal play (probably 55+% winrate). We also have some jungle changes that may be going in in the future that disproportionately hurt Lee Sin compared to other junglers. Also I believe that when Lee sin is balanced (but still playable in competitive) he doesn't disproportionately harm jungle diversity in competitive. 

The context was to balance Lee to be both playable in competitive and solo queue, because he is one of the few champions that is so multi-dimensional and has such a high skillcap that it can actually be achieved. I think you would agree that some champions just cant be balanced for competitive in their current state, since they would require significant buffs that would destroy soloqueue (Garen, Amumu, Annie, Blitz come to mind). 

Nowhere does that say "broken" or because of LC$. In fact, I would guess that buffing some champions would be GREAT for LCS - how loud do you think the crowd would go if Blitz ever became a competitive pick? And plus, I dont know about you, but I find the competitive meta to be pretty stagnant and could use a reshuffling. But we really dont need Blitz buffs for soloqueue just to get him competitively viable.

>

- Reduction of vision provided by E
- 50/-100/-150 AD to ult

The vision drop shouldn't even qualify since I don't think ANYONE complaining about Lee cites the vision provided by his E as a problem.  And if the problem is his early game snowballing (since Lee "drops off late"), then nerfing him by making those changes to his ult is a joke.

Actions tend to favor the side saying they favor Lee, but I'll take other comments from the thread I noted at face value that Lee scales well from low to high elo. (ie. he's about AS effective at low elo as he as at high elo, rather than being busted in one and not the other)  But I understand the complaint that he's too dominant/omni-present regardless.
